name: Pata Pata Panic
overview:
Pata Pata Panic is a memory reflex game by Atlus Co., Ltd.© 1993

Pata Pata Panic Is one of those games where you have to raise flags with the correct orders, some can be tricky as you dont have to raise/lower the flags, as the game continues, the more correct answers, the faster your reflexes needs to be, because the timer will be faster, but the voices are random speeds, sometimes faster, sometimes slower.
